pages.text: Once you have a MIDI Input Device successfully connected to your computer you will need to select the device in MIMI.$(br2)To select the MIDI Input Device that MIMI you can open the Device Config Screen using the configured key bind ($(bold)$(k:key.mimi.midi.gui.settings)$()) or by crafting and then right-clicking a MIDI Device Config item:

pages.title: Device Config Screen
pages.text: This screen lets you to set the MIDI Input Device that MIMI should use.$(br2)At the bottom you will see the available devices that you can choose from. You can refresh the list with the refresh button and scroll through the list using the arrows. Once you find the desired device, click the save button to select it. This selection will be saved and used automatically next time you launch the game.

Once you have selected your desired device check the status light in the upper section of the screen. If it is red, this device is not functioning correctly and may need to be reconnected. If it is yellow then the game must be restarted to correctly connect to this device. If it is green then you are good to go!$(br2)If no devices are visible in the list, even after refreshing, consult the previous section to try connecting again.
